about_the_game:
Space Dwellers!

Drones, Robots, and Space Dwellers!
This product includes:
  • Drone_hover_dark_fly[drone,robot,space,fly]
  • Drone_hover_green_fly[drone,robot,space,fly]
  • Drone_hover_red_fly[drone,robot,space,fly]
  • Drone_roller_beige[drone,robot,space,armored]
  • Drone_roller_blue[drone,robot,space,armored]
  • Drone_roller_red[drone,robot,space,armored]
  • Drone_Spider_Fire[drone,robot,space]
  • Drone_Spider_Fire_Broken[drone,robot,space,broken]
  • Drone_Spider_Frost[drone,robot,space]
  • Drone_Spider_Frost_Broken[drone,robot,space,broken]
  • Drone_Spider_Jaw[drone,robot,space]
  • Drone_Spider_Jaw_Broken[drone,robot,space,broken]
  • Merc_green[Space,Mercenary,Bounty,Thug]
  • Merc_pink[Space,Mercenary,Bounty,Thug]
  • Merc_Sand[Space,Mercenary,Bounty,Thug]
  • Trooper_Assault[Trooper,Space,Guard,Marine,Soldier,Rifle]
  • Trooper_DronePilot[Trooper,Space,Guard,Marine,Soldier,Pistol]
  • Trooper_Riot_Heavy[Trooper,Space,Guard,Marine,Soldier,Truncheon,Mace,Shock]
  • Trooper_Riot_Light[Trooper,Space,Guard,Marine,Soldier,Baton,Mace,Truncheon,Pistol]
  • Trooper_ShockDrone[Trooper,Space,Guard,Marine,Soldier,Drone,Robot,Shock]
  • Trooper_Siege[Trooper,Space,Guard,Marine,Soldier,Canon,Rifle,Launcher]
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Kevin Doswell

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity or Fantasy Grounds Classic

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

name: Fantasy Grounds - Space Dwellers!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x, 8x, or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
